snippet.title: Myth of Empires - Behind the Scenes - Horses
snippet.description:
Horses were a big part of ancient warfare and they’re a big part of Myth of Empires. The fine folks at Animatrik helped us with bring these horses to life with motion capture.

Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1371580/Myth_of_Empires/

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/mythofempires

#MythofEmpires #gamedev #mocap #Animatrik
